text: Halil is a common Turkish given name. It is equivalent to the Arabic given name and surname Khalil or its variant Khaleel. Notable persons with the name Halil include: * Halil Akıncı (born 1945), Turkish diplomat * Halil Altıntop (born 1982), Turkish footballer * Halil Akkaş (born 1983), Turkish middle distance runner * Halil Berktay (born 1947), Turkish historian * Halil Çolak (born 1988), Turkish footballer * Halil Ergün (born 1946), Turkish actor * Halil Gür (born 1951), Dutch author of Turkish origin * Halil İbrahim Eren (born 1956), Turkish footballer * Halil İnalcık (born 1916), Turkish historian * Halil Pasha (born 1971), various people * Halil Tikveša (born 1935), Bosnian painter * Halil Zıraman (1927–1984), Turkish javelin thrower ==See also== * *Khalil (disambiguation) *Khalil (name)
title: Halil
